title: FRIDAY 1/22 - Championship weekend 2021
itunes:title: FRIDAY 1/22 - Championship weekend 2021
description:
Chiefs fans waiting with baited breath on the status of Patrick Mahomes (0:13) as we have the latest on his availability for Sunday's game against the Bills. The Bucs will have to wait and see if they'll have Antonio Brown (0:42) as well. The Jets introduce new head coach Robert Saleh (1:00) as he talked about the future of Sam Darnold in New York (1:22). New Lions head coach Dan Campbell (1:47) giving Detroit fans a reason to be excited...and the Eagles zeroing in on their new head coach (3:10)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
